name: Flat-button.GitHub.io
tagline: Ufak buton kütüphanesi buna kütüphanede denmezde neyse :)
body:
# Flat Button Ufak buton kütüphanesi buna kütüphanede denmezde neyse :) #Boyutlandırma ![Image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/muhammedzaimtr/flat-button/master/images/1.png) ```html
XSmall
Small
Medium
Large
XLarge
``` #Örnek Renkler ![Image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/muhammedzaimtr/flat-button/master/images/2.png) ```html
Carrot
SunFlower
Asphalt
Alizarin
River
``` #Disabled ve Radius ![Image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/muhammedzaimtr/flat-button/master/images/3.png) ```html
xsmall carrot radius
small sunflower radius
medium asphalt radius
large alizarin radius disabled
xlarge river disabled
``` #Radius ![Image](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/muhammedzaimtr/flat-button/master/images/4.png) ```html
xsmall radius
small radius
medium radius
large radius
xlarge radius
``` ##Kulanım ve Dosyaları İndirme :) ```html $ git clone https://github.com/muhammedzaimtr/flat-button.git Sıkıştırılmamış Css Dosyası: Sıkıştırılmış Css Dosyası: ``` ##Öneri :) ```html ZeroPage css sıfırlama ile kullanılması önerilir... ``` #LICENSE This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.
